Title: Nest Box
Writer: Alyson Feltes, Bill Dubuque (created by), Mark Williams (created by), Martin Zimmerman (story editor), Paul Kolsby (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: To stop Jacob from carrying out his threat, Marty makes an offer. Agent Petty gets what he needs to turn Russ. Charlotte grows desperate to escape.
